reactTabInfo: Check out the new Admin-tab "Homebridge" (needs to be manually activated) for a more convenient way to install plugins and configure them (Beta).
selectOptionGlobal: Global Mode (start a compatible globally installed Homebridge)
selectOptionLocal: Local Mode (install a local Homebridge in ioBroker as a bridge)
selectOptionWrapper: Wrapper Mode (just run Homebridge plugins in ioBroker)
Name: Name
global_mode_note: This instance is configured in global mode. The installation of modules and configuration is managed outside of ioBroker and thus nothing can be configured here.
Do you really want to remove %s: Do you really want to remove %s?
